original_text: Thus says the Lord of hosts: “Let your hands be strong, you who in these days have been hearing these words from the mouth of the prophets who were present on the day that the foundation of the house of the Lord of hosts was laid, that the temple might be built.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 만군의 여호와의 집 곧 성전을 건축하려고 그 지대를 쌓던 날에 있었던 선지자들의 입의 말을 이 날에 듣는 너희는 손을 견고히 할지어다

sentences.original_text: Thus says the Lord of hosts:
you who in these days have been hearing these words
sentences.korean_translation: 이 날에 이 말을 듣는 너희는

sentences.original_text: from the mouth of the prophets
who were present on the day
that the foundation of the house of the Lord of hosts was laid,
sentences.korean_translation: 만군의 여호와의 성전 기초가 놓인 날이니

sentences.original_text: that the temple might be built.
